2.title: Time value of money
2.content: We'd take a dollar today over a dollar tomorrow because today is more certain

3.title: Discounted cash flows
3.content: To receive a dollar tomorrow, we'd need to be compensated for the credit risk we're taking

4.title: Discounted cash flows - cont'd
4.content: We'd invest less than a dollar today, with the expectation that we'd get a dollar tomorrow
